org.docx4j.convert.out.pdf.viaXSLFO
Class PartTracker

java.lang.Object
  org.docx4j.convert.out.pdf.viaXSLFO.PartTracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransformState
public class PartTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransformState

The XSLT applies mainly to the MainDocumentPart, but it also processes some other parts (eg headers, footers), and for those, it is sometimes necessary to know which part we're in (eg image processing).
